entry.title: Hand Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Olio E Osso
Type: Hand Cream
Price: 25.00

An exceptionally rich, nourishing hand cream that hydrates and soothes. Made without lanolin, using moisturizing shea butter and natural oils that protects skin, this cream gives hands a long-lasting, velvety smooth feel.

• 2 oz | 57 g

• Made by hand in small batches in Portland, Oregon

Ingredients

Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Nut Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Maranta Arundinacea (Arrowroot) Root Powder, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium (Neroli) Flower Oil, Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Gum Resin Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Farnesol.

Directions

Use pointed end of cap to puncture tube opening. Expect hand cream to be stiff upon initial use due to its nutrient dense quality. A little goes a long way! Simply smooth a small amount of cream all over hands (or elbows, knees, heels or anywhere else needing attention) and allow time for it to absorb into skin.

entry.title: Hand Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: gallinee
Type: Hand Cream
Price: 20.00

For hands that are supple and oh-so-soft

Soothes, hydrates, and repairs. Helps support your good bacteria, regenerating dry and damaged skin. Hands are left feeling soft, supple, and are protected from external aggressors.

Gallinée Hand Cream boasts a lightweight and fast-absorbing formula to soften and intensely nourish dry hands. The ultra-active formula contains hydrating shea butter + brightening daisy extract, combined with a patented Triple Biotic Complex of prebiotics, probiotics and postbiotics to help support your skin’s microbiome in the most gentle and effective way possible.

Life hack: Hand Cream also doubles as a foot cream!

• 1.7 fl oz | 50 ml

• 94% natural origin ingredients

• Physiological pH: All Gallinée products are made to match the optimal pH of the skin and the microbiome.

• No products of animal origin - Never tested on animals.

• Made WITHOUT: Doesn’t contain colorants, parabens, mineral oils, silicones, microbeads, phenoxyethanol or methylisothiazolinone.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water)*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride*, Cetearyl Alcohol*, Alpha-glucan Oligosaccharide*, Glycerin*, Lactic Acid*, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp Copolymer, Cetyl Alcohol*, Cetearyl Glucoside*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Inulin*, Perfume (Fragrance), Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice*, Tocopheryl Acetate*, Bellis Perennis (Daisy) Flower Extract*, Lactobacillus*, Arginine*, Maltodextrin*, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract*, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane (Avobenzone), Ethylhexyl Salicylate (Octisalate), Xanthan Gum*, Phenethyl Alcohol*, Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide*, Sodium Phosphate, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Limonene.

Directions

Massage into the hands as often as needed, especially after washing your hands.

entry.title: Papaya SOS Marmalade
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: All Purpose Balm
Price: 30.00

Skin rehab in a vital, soothe-all marmalade balm. Rescue your skin with this nourishing cocktail of coconut, hemp, chia, grapefruit oil & fermented papaya that helps to hasten the delivery of essential antioxidants & vitamins to the skin. An ultra-repairing formula to soothe any little abrasions, skin freakouts, dryness, insect bites or scars, this wonder balm melts into skin and is useful to heal + protect.

Designed for face + hands + feet + body + hair. An all-in-one remedy rich in zinc, magnesium & potassium. Calendula calms inflammation to aid in your skin’s healing, while chia adds omegas. Use a lot or a little, ideal for travel and all of life’s adventures, big & small.

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

• 1 oz / 30 g

Ingredients

caprylic/capric triglyceride, sweet almond (prunis amygdalus dulcis) oil, coconut (cocos nucifera) oil, candelilla (euphorbia cerifera) wax, mango (mangifera indica) seed butter, jojoba (simmondsia chinensis) seed oil, hemp (cannabis sativa) seed oil, shea (butyrospermum parkii) butter, vegetable squalane, tocopherol (vitamin e), buriti (mauritia flexuosa) fruit oil, papaya (carica papaya) fermented extract, chia (salvia hispanica) seed oil, grapefruit (citrus grandis) seed extract, olive (olea europaea) fruit oil, glycerin, ascorbic acid, calendula (calendula officinalis) flower extract.

Directions

Apply to improve, protect lips, hands, scars, cuticles, heels, hair, insect bites, scrapes, bruises or any dry skin. Rub until the product has fully absorbed. Also gently removes makeup.

entry.title: Hand + Foot Relief
entry.summary:
Vendor: Graydon
Type: Hand Cream
Price: 20.00

The Hand and Foot Relief formulation will soften and help heal calloused, cracked hands, feet, heels, and elbows. Its rich texture is long lasting without leaving behind an oily residue. Infused with Graydon's invigorating GermsAway AromaBlend, its aromatic fresh scent will refresh your skin while its antimicrobial action helps to kill topical germs that cause both bad odor and infection.

• 50 ml / 1.7 fl oz

• Gluten-free

• NO nut derived ingredients

Made WITHOUT Artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

purified water (aqua), cetyl alcohol (coconut product), stearyl alcohol (mixed plant), vegetable glycerin (glycerol), sunflower oil (helianthis annus), olive oil (olea europaea), jojoba oil (jojoba), shea butter (butyrospernum parkii), sodium lactate, grapefruit seed extract (citrus grandis).

Directions

Massage cream onto hands, heels, elbows, knees, even lips! Made for any part of your body that is extremely dry or chapped requiring extra attention. Use as often as needed. And don’t forget to inhale and enjoy its wonderful therapeutic spa like aroma!

entry.title: Apothecary Rose Hand Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hudson Made
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 28.00

Introducing Hudson Made's Apothecary Rose Hand Soap, a liquid based version of their classic rose scent. Mildly intoxicating with notes of Rose Oil, Patchouli, Rose Geranium, and Cinnamon Leaf, Rose Hand soap sits handsomely next to the bathroom or kitchen sink. Rose has also long been shown to improve skin texture and soothe irritated skin.

• All Natural Ingredients

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

• 10 fl oz - Made in the USA

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Potassium Cocoate, Decyl Glucoside, Natural Fragrance, Passiflora Edulis (Passion Fruit) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai Palm) Fruit Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

Directions

Use as needed.

entry.title: Morning Shift Hand Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hudson Made
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 28.00

Based on Hudson Made's ever popular Morning Shift Body Bar, the Liquid Hand Soap version sits handsomely next to the bathroom or kitchen sink. Breathe easy once again as pure rosemary + eucalyptus oils stir the senses and uplifts the spirit, while Peppermint awakens your hands with a slight tingle.

• All Natural Ingredients

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

• 10 fl oz - Made in the USA

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Potassium Cocoate, Decyl Glucoside, Passiflora Edulis (Passion Fruit) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai Palm) Fruit Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Oil , Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil.

Directions

Use as needed.

entry.title: Hai Hand + Body Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 40.00

An invigorating liquid hand + body soap containing pure Char Essence, specifically formulated for hard-working hands, yet gentle enough to use on your body and sensitive skin.

Char Essence is a natural byproduct from the traditional production of White Charcoal, long valued in Japan for its purifying and balancing effect on the skin, as well as for its delicious woody and smoky scent. Shiro Soap is made using only the finest natural and eco-gentle ingredients.

Sort of Coal products have an efficient, waste-free lifecycle. Cross-cutting the wood to make White Charcoal is done in a thoughtful way such that the forests are restored rather than destroyed.

• 16.9 oz / 500ml

• Made in Denmark

• White Charcoal contains more than 90 percent pure carbon and has a powerful ability to absorb due to its extremely porous surface. It is at the heart of centuries old Asian traditions surrounding well-being and purification

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium, Coco-sulfate, Oak Vinegar, Glycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl, Caprylate, Phenylpropanol, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Chloride.

Directions

Use as a hand and/or body soap.

entry.title: Kuro Charcoal Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: Body Wash
Price: 25.00

Sort of Coal is a pioneering Danish company that specializes in producing beautiful and functional White Charcoal products that naturally purify the air, water and body. With White Charcoal as a central element in all of their products, they combine traditional Japanese craftsmanship with functional Danish design.

A black soap, with activated charcoal from pine leaves.  The activated coal is well-known for its ability to cleanse and to absorb impurities. The Kuro Soap is especially suited for normal/oily skin and can be used for the body as well.

Sort Of Coal products have an efficient, waste-free lifecycle. Cross-cutting the wood to make White Charcoal is done in a thoughtful way such that the forests are restored rather than destroyed. And when you need to dispose of it, White Charcoal can be used as an excellent fertilizer.

• Made with White Charcoal powder, which is the highest grade of charcoal available. The raw material used in Kuro Soap is Korean red pine leaves

• White Charcoal contains more than 90 percent pure carbon and has a powerful ability to absorb due to its extremely porous surface. It is at the heart of centuries-old Asian traditions surrounding well-being and purification

• Made in Denmark

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Elaesis Guineensis Oil (Palm Oil), Cocos Nucifera Oil (Coconut Oil), Aqua, Sodium Hydroxide, white charcoal powder from red pine leaves.

Directions

Use as a face and/or body soap.

entry.title: Scullery Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hudson Made
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 18.00

Made from locally harvested, restorative and balancing ingredients like rose geranium oil, mineral salt, and all natural beeswax of the finest quality, this cleansing soap is perfectly suited for hands and forearms hard at work in the kitchen. Beeswax soap is a harder, longer lasting, tough soap that helps hands resist dryness and irritation caused by frequent washing. Leaves skin smooth and clean, ready to rustle up a meal or indulge in one.

Hudson Made’s scullery soap pays homage to the tradition of the homestead and works well on all of your rough spots. It’s a soap for anyone who possesses a multitudinous passion for the kitchen or a hard day’s work — and for whatever those efforts may yield.

• 5.5 oz

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Coconut Oil*, Olive Oil*, Palm Oil*, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Magnesium, Lime Essential Oil, Litsea Cubeba Essential Oil, Rose Geranium Essential Oil, Honey Absolute, White Kaolin Clay, White Bees Wax. *Organic

Directions

Not intended for pots, pans or face.

entry.title: Worker's Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hudson Made
Type: Hand Soap
Price: 18.00

This small-batch, artisanal product is for the man (or woman) who understands that being good with your hands means being good to your hands. Whether your dukes are calloused from carpentry, weary from woodworking or pencil-stained from paper-pushing, Worker's Soap provides your hands with a heavy-duty, capable clean. And it's not just a hand soap: natural pumice makes it perfectly suited for scrubbing tough spots like elbows and feet.

• Endowed with the unburdening aromas of tobacco, cedar and patchouli, Worker's Soap has a scent that is nothing short of hardy and strapping.

• It will leave your hands soft, refreshed and ever ready for the next big project.

• Handcrafted in the Western Adirondacks.

• 4.0 oz

Made WITHOUT Artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Coconut Oil, Olive Oil. Palm Oil, Water, Hemp Seed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Shea Butter, Fine Grade Pumice, Comfrey Root Powder, Tobacco Fragrance Oil, Patchouli Essential Oil, Cedar Leaf Oil, Cedarwood Essential Oil.

Directions

Use as a heavy-duty hand soap and/or scrub as natural pumice makes it perfectly suited for scrubbing tough spots like elbows and feet.

entry.title: Nail + Cuticle Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: FIG+YARROW
Type: Nail and Cuticle
Price: 10.00 - 20.00 (2 variants)

F+Y Nail & Cuticle Salve is a highly nourishing blend of herbs, oils and botanical essences for enhanced strength + appearance of nails.

Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Artificial Fragrances, Silicones, Synthetic Dyes, Artificial Colors, Petrochemicals, & Animal Testing

Ingredients

Olea europea (olive) oil*†, Cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil*†, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter*†, Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) oil*, Cera alba (beeswax)*, Azadirachta indica (neem) oil*, Equisetum arvense (horsetail)*, Avena sativa (oatstraw)*, Urtica dioica (nettle)*, Rosmarinus officinalia (rosemary)*, Arcticum lappa (burdock) root*, Tocopherol (vitamin E, non-GMO), Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, essential oils of: Citrus limon (lemon), Lavandula angustifolia (lavender)*, Cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass), Pelargonium graveolens (geranium), Commiphora myrrha (myrrh), Melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree), Daucus carota (carrot seed). *certified organic, †virgin

Directions

Regularly massage small amount into nail and cuticle of both fingers and toes; disburse excess over hands and feet to provide added benefit.
